articles.title: Russia says Ukraine talks hit 'dead end', Poland warns of risk of war - Reuters
articles.description: Poland's foreign minister said on Thursday that Europe was closer to war than any time in the last 30 years as Russia gave a bleak assessment of diplomatic efforts this week to defuse tensions over Ukraine.
